_schema_desc: Horizontal Bar Chart Template v2.0 - Bars grow left to right
_usage_desc: Best for: Rankings, leaderboards, long category names. Bars animate from left to right.
_chartType_desc: Identifies this as a horizontal bar chart for the renderer

dimensions._desc: Canvas dimensions optimized for TikTok 1:1 format

margin._desc: Padding inside the canvas. Left margin is larger to fit category labels.

background._desc: Background color. Use #00FF00 for green screen transparency in CapCut.

title._desc: Main title at the top of the chart

labels._desc: Category labels shown to the left of each bar

values._desc: Value labels shown at the end of each bar

bars._height_desc: Height of each bar in pixels

gridLines._desc: Vertical grid lines behind the bars

animation._desc: Controls how bars animate into view
animation._duration_desc: Base animation duration in frames (30 = 1 second at 30fps)
animation._simultaneous_desc: All bars grow at the same time
animation._staggered_desc: Each bar waits for the previous bar to FINISH before starting
animation._wave_desc: Bars start at staggerDelay intervals, may overlap
animation._velocityMode_desc: When true, shorter bars animate faster (proportional to value)
animation._staggerDelay_desc: Extra pause (in frames) between bars. For staggered style, this is added after each bar finishes.
